The Outpost Hotel Sentosa The Outpost Hotel Sentosa caters exclusively for adults who want an island getaway with equal measures of fun and romance. The hotel's 193 contemporary deluxe rooms feature a signature black and white palette. Majority of the rooms offer either a panoramic sea view or a view of the pool deck. Guests are treated to a welcome drink, toiletries by Australian beauty brand APPELLES Apothecary and Lab, a pillow mist kit for turndown service and are able to customise their own mini-bar items from a range of selection of premium snacks and drinks. The Outpost Hotel's rooftop 1 Altitude Coast Day Club and Sol and Ora Restaurant is one of the island's best spot to catch the sunset, offering sensational views of the Singapore Strait. It is an iconic day-to-night lifestyle destination that features a coastal-luxe Day Club complete with an infinity pool, and a smart-casual progressive Asian Restaurant.
